lenders.occupational_info:
I love what I do and I love my family. 

You have one life, make health a priority which people seem to ignore now these days because it's not tangible. I believe working hard at something has the greatest return  because it gives you self-worth. 

Quote: 

"I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying." - Michael Jordan

lenders.name: AmbidextrousMusic
lenders.loan_because: If it's wasn't for people like my brother/business partner, his wife & my wife I wouldn't have my on production company and be able to follow my dreams. So I want to give others the same kind of help that I got.
lenders.occupational_info: We write and produce music for artist, my self included, as well as networks like FOX Sports Net who are our biggest client. We also promote nostalgic hip-hop events called "Deja Vu It's 92" in Houston to preserve the legacy of authentic hip-hop at it best. Our future goals are to get into film & we have a tee-shirt line ready to launch in 08 called LOCTURNAL. It's all entertainment so everything we do is one in the same.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because:
Entrepreneurs can change the world.  When people connect through great services like Kiva, great things happen.

I started my career in the non-profit sector with the US-Baltic Foundation, providing educational and technical aid.  My cousin works in microfinance in Benin.  It is truly amazing how effective it can be.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an entrepreneur that most recently co-founded Socialtext.  We make wiki software like what powers Wikipedia.  "Wiki Wiki" means "very quick" in Hawaiian and wikis are wonderfuly simple tools for collaboration.

Socialtext often donates wikis in-kind to non-profit organizations and by default provide a 50% discount to them.

lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my three kids.  They are 8,3, and 2.

lenders.name: kerry

Our goal is to assis these individuals in staying in their own homes as long as possible, and helping them make choices about long-term institutionalized care.

lenders.name: Kendall
lenders.loan_because: I am a big supporter of microfinance and it is a great way for people to be connected across the globe. I wrote my senior college paper on microfinance and have been involved ever since.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an international exchange company called Intrax. I set up international students/ au pairs with host families in the U.S.A.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: It feels like the right thing to do.

lenders.name: coolidge
lenders.loan_because: i beleave strongly in a hand up!

lenders.name: Chuck & Alexandra
lenders.loan_because:
We like to help people create their own business and improve their lives. We all need a hand sometimes. 
"Hands that give will never be empty"

lenders.name: DAN&CHERYL
lenders.loan_because: I HAVE A GOOD LIFE AND WANT TO HELP..
lenders.occupational_info: I REPAIR COMMERCIAL FOOD PROCESS EQ.

lenders.name: Agrim
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great concept, Kiva has been doing a fantastic job and I loan because I think peace and prosperity go hand in hand

lenders.name: Las Family
lenders.loan_because: We' have gotten to a stage in our lives where we realize that we have been blessed and it's time to give back as a family!!  We want to no longer just live, but make a difference!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a bank and try to help people reach their financial goals.  My wife works with students and is bilingual in Spanish.  Our Children are students!!

lenders.name: Guy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: It's very tough and you need to work very hard if you want to become a baller.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase raw land, clear it, clean it, make it usable then sell for a profit.

lenders.name: Mark, Jennifer & Q
lenders.loan_because: We are so grateful for all the things we have and want to give back to others.  This is a great way to help others across the world help themselves and we look forward to this opportunity repeating itself.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a program that helps homeowners get control of their financial situation, get out of debt and build financial security.

lenders.name: ;Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people out of unconditional love
lenders.occupational_info: moving mountains of need to mountains of joy

lenders.name: Kalli
lenders.loan_because: I just love the idea of microloans and believe they really can make a difference in poor economies.
lenders.occupational_info: My work has mostly been sitting at my computer making text and pictures look great on paper or internet.

lenders.name: shirlee
lenders.loan_because: I recieve joy from helping people

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I sell residential real estate

lenders.name: Noorani
lenders.loan_because: it brings me happiness

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: "there but by the grace of God"; my Lord asks this of me and I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: We are all God's children. I pray for your success!

lenders.name: myrna
lenders.loan_because: Helping others helps me
lenders.occupational_info: Building of Peace and Compassion

lenders.name: Rick Kenney
lenders.loan_because: It's right.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that when people are working towards a goal, they can succeed.

lenders.name: reiner
lenders.loan_because:
this is reiners first loan.
Reiner died on 2.11.07 .
 the idea of kiva is still living- and of cause reiner allways try to support  the poorest , we lend the rest of money on his account, in his name.
so his little money start a long way 
as loan and hopefully it never stops and  help  again and again people to change their lifes.
so even if reiner is dead 
his love to the poorest and to the world  will be still alive.

lenders.name: Geneviève
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others, particularly women, a bit of support because I've been lucky enough to always receive support to reach my own goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the field of mental health.

lenders.name: Lex
lenders.loan_because: I believe when people work together they can achieve great things, and that everyone should have the opportunity to live their dreams

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: It's just one small thing I can do to feel like I contribute to our global society.

lenders.name: Autis
lenders.loan_because: Just wanted to help.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to give someone who wants to succeed a helping hand up and not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the luxury of staying at home with my 3 children.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: We have so much in Canada and we waste a great deal of what is given to us in this country. To give reminds me of what I have and that I should be grateful. I hope my pittance will help families educate their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a university department in one of Canada's top institutions. I am very proud to work for McGill University and the McGill School of Environment.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because:
I spend my money on things I later end up either not using, or selling. 
I give to others in the hopes that they will use the money wisely, and their lives will be better because of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm looking for a place in the world.

lenders.name: Andrea and Allison W.
lenders.loan_because: Our aunt made these contributions for our Christmas gifts....

lenders.name: Doreen
lenders.loan_because: I have experienced the struggle!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell out-of-print and rare books to collectors and buyers all over the world.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: It is just the right thing to do.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world no matter how small it may seem.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach electrical students how to install electricity safely.

lenders.name: Teemu
lenders.occupational_info: I work for sales.

lenders.name: Jayne
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a differance in this world. It makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: We mine for gold by washing the gravels and seperate and recover the gold. Placer means that the gold is in the gravels.

lenders.name: JAMES C.
lenders.loan_because: Because I can, and I want to help.  I want to go to heaven at the end.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an Oil and Gas Company in the Gulf of Mexico.  I am a Lead Operator On a platform

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: It felt so great to get my first loan re-paid back to me.  Now I've re-loaned it out to help another person.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I feel the need to contribute to the world around me.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I realize how blessed I have been and wish to help make those less fortunate than I take pride in their accomplishments.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked 38 years as an operator for a large telephone company. I am now retired and do a lot of volunteering in my community. I just lost my husband two days ago and am trying to continue my life as he would have wanted.

lenders.name: Darrell
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to fund a dream/occupation to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for a global company that did business all over the world.  I have seen many cultures and personal circumstances.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I loan  for my own selfish reason's ..I simply love to help people and I think that this orgainization is amazing..sometimes a little bit of money is all someone needs to get on thier feet and make a difference in thier life: A family business empowers people to help themselves. Kiva empowers me to financially help someone make a difference in thier life. Thank You Kiva and Thank you Oprah for telling us about this amazing organization and giving us this opportunity to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a single mom I have 1 biological daughter and 2 foster boy siblings. I hope one day that when they leave my home that i have improved thier life in someway and that they will pass it down to their children.  pay it forward

lenders.name: Mirko
lenders.loan_because: ... everybody should do it who can afford.
lenders.occupational_info: Making things happen.

lenders.name: Marianne Hutchings
lenders.loan_because: Anyone with the dream of making a better life deserves the chance to make that dream a reality.

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: everyone should do something to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I can ... and I should.

lenders.name: karla
lenders.occupational_info: I am a grade 11 student from Canada.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur and would like to help other women entrepreneurs succeed and improve their lives and hopefully create jobs for others as well.

lenders.name: Lauryn
lenders.loan_because: Helping is my favorite verb.
lenders.occupational_info: I'll make it simple. Exciting.

lenders.name: Emilia
lenders.loan_because: I have a choice.
lenders.occupational_info:

•Proficient with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
•Specializing in surface design, textile art and photography.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.occupational_info: office work in a hospital

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to help people overseas that I wouldn't normally be able to help.

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: When given the opportunity, we all thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I fuse two languages, convey concepts and make things clear for all involved.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I think this is one of the BEST ideas anyone ever came up with!

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: my family and I are so blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach choir and piano lab at a Chicago high school for the arts.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be where I am in this life.

lenders.name: Arlene
lenders.loan_because: I believe that one of the best ways to resolve poverty is to help empower people.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have always had an entrepreneurs' spirit. I have had many different types of businesses. 
I say find the one thing that you love and go for it, and then keep going and going!

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: It was a challenge from Franciscan Sister Ada Kroll, based on her distribution to friends of the money gifts she received commemorating her 50th year as a Franciscan Sister of Little Falls, MN
lenders.occupational_info: Faithful Fools build community in the Tenderloin of San Francisco CA through street retreats, neighborhood potlucks, art shows, clowning, magic, film foolstival, poetry open mike, helping people stay housed, helping people get their social services, educating City Hall about street realities.  Check us out on the web!

lenders.name: Soli
lenders.loan_because: We can give hope to People that otherwise would never qualify for loans anywhere else in their Countries. Why not help when We can do it? babymend@aol.com
lenders.occupational_info: I work behind a desk in a Point of Service for a very well known Insurance Provider. I receive phone calls from Partner Insurance Agents and assist with any questions on policy that may arise.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance and  needs to know that at least one person  in this world believes in them.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide nursing care for kids 6yrs. & under.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage all people to strive for success in their lives. If I can help someone do that... then why not!
lenders.occupational_info: Very rewarding and physically and emotionally challenging. You are impacting the futures and lives of young children and hopefully putting them on a positive life track!

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.occupational_info: Art !

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I am very happy to able to make a living as a self employed seamstress and I want to help others find the same success and happiness working for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Sewing alterations and repairs for retail stores and individuals in my city.

lenders.name: carrie
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone a chance to  live a happier life.

lenders.name: Ervin
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I translate documents from one language to another.

lenders.name: Dean
lenders.loan_because:
It is one of the beautiful compensations of this life that no one can sincerely try to help another without helping himself. 
- Charles Dudley

lenders.name: Barry & Karen
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help and this is one way to assist someone to improve their life

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: So fortunate to live where I do.    Feel the need to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people acheive their goal of home ownership.

lenders.name: Meislik Family
lenders.loan_because: We are interested in helping small businesses in the developing world and we are investigating starting a micro-lending fund.
lenders.occupational_info: Karen helps families with legal issues.

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to offer some one else so much. Why wouldn't you. This site helps fill some the needs I found I had after getting a degree in Women's Studies. I like to think I am helping another woman be self sufficient and live a better life somewhere in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I went to school for women's studies and art. I did (and still do some) drawing and painting and sculpture and lithography or printmaking and I learned about women's issues (women's lives now and in the past as well some things about women all over the world) I am a mother of one daughter and I live and work in Toronto Canada now. I would like to find a way to pass the gifts I have been given on to other people.

lenders.name: Cat
lenders.loan_because:
God wishes that we share our good fortune and bless others. 
It truly lifts our spirit, when we assist one in need or help achieve one's dream.  
Blessings to all for reaching out and supporting this wonderful initiative.
lenders.occupational_info:
I luv my precious cats, my outdoor feathered friends and enjoy the simple things in life. 
Primarily, I worked in Admin./IT Contracting and also served as a volunteer Union Rep.  
I retired summer 2010 and look forward to all the opportunities that cross my path.

lenders.name: Oliver Wilhelm
lenders.loan_because: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush

lenders.name: Tonya
lenders.loan_because: Working with Kiva allows me to help others. It is another way to show you do not have to be rich to help change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I love being able to make a difference!

lenders.name: Ahren
lenders.loan_because: I am a college student, and I could not have gone to college myself, without a loan.  Loans are very important.  They help people who want to make their own lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying Computer Science, at California Polytechnic University, in San Luis Obispo, California.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a 13 yr digital professional and am so proud to be a part of an industry that is spreading the power of Microfinance. Nerds rock!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in my life, and it is important to me to show my daughter how small things can change the world, rather than sitting around and talking about it all day!
lenders.occupational_info: Lots of studying to become an anthropologist

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Everyday I work with businesses and colleagues all over the world and help them grow.  I love to travel and the best part of any trip is the people I meet.  I was an entrepreneur before I went into a corporate role and greatly admire every person that has the ambition , drive and perseverance to create their own destiny. I  believe the world is small, we're all neighbours,  and helping eachother is only natural.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a global marketing manager for a major international technology firm.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: To help others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It is important to give back and give people the chance to improve their life!  If we all do something, our world will be a better place for our children.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second language to Adults.

lenders.name: Cari
lenders.loan_because: I can reach out across thousands of miles and help, one on one from me to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a team of specialists to create cumputer systems for the company I work for and it's customers.

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because: I wish to give!
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and have returned to university for further education.

lenders.name: Mahendra
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who have the courage and the will to work hard and support themselves & their family. This is true capitalism..
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes Jet engines for the largest and most poweful airplanes to the small business jets.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: What better way to show human compassion than to give the money you would spend on your daily Starbucks coffee to people who can then in turn help their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Airline Representative.  In addition to working as a senior Supervisor in a demanding hospital setting supervising technicians who provide acute care to all areas of a 800 plus bed hospital.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because:
I can. 
I want to encourage women in impoverished areas start and be successful with their businesses.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: giving makes my happy

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone out to make their life easier

lenders.name: Anders
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a briliant idea to make the world more equal and less tense.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm making sure that my team creates and deliver what is expected by an agreement.

lenders.name: Sondra
lenders.loan_because: Much was given to me as a young struggling parent. I'll never forget that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a hospital

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: it is such a small thing to me, and such a huge thing for the person receiving the help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  a wife, and a mother of am amazing beautiful little spirit who is nearly 6 years old. I am doing the best I can and strive to be better every day, and make the world a better place for my child and others

lenders.name: Marcy & Bob
lenders.loan_because: it makes us happy to support someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Marcy is a teacher.  She teaches 4th grade students who have special needs or disabilities.

lenders.name: Les
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help people help themselves, their family and their community.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I connect companies looking for engineers with engineers looking for a new opportunity. It's great because I get to help people.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I am my brothers keeper and I feel responsible for others. Imagine if each person helped another person in the world.  You don't have to be a millionaire to help.  I love KIVA this is such a great idea - I saw this on Oprah and am telling all my friends to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a secretary and shuffle papers and I teach ESL (English as a Second Language) at Marietta College.  I love to work with people and help them.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I know I can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 3rd grade.

lenders.name: Trisha
lenders.loan_because: There is a time in everyone's life when they need the help of others and I have been fortunate to have been given a lot of help in my life and want to pass it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher.  I teach children who have hearing impairments, and I work with them one on one at their school.  I teach children from four years old to 18, and we work on everything from speech and language skills, school work, to social skills.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: I am consantly seeking out ways in which I can help others and connect with other parts of the world I live in. Although my budget is limited, I believe that every little bit helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying English Literature at The University of Toronto and I am hoping to go to graduate school.  I have a freelance writing business and I am a part-time musician.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: Every single person deserves the dignity of working and supporting themselves.  Charity is most often what they need the least.  What people need is a little help to get going.
lenders.occupational_info: I register documents and plans for land ownership in British Columbia Canada.

lenders.name: Line
lenders.loan_because: I just think it's a good think
lenders.occupational_info: I working in hospital too give the people the medicament that they need.   Excuse my english, my languahge is french

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and feel very fortunate to be able to help others. The biggest gift we receive is the gift of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people become the best they can be..

lenders.name: Krysta
lenders.loan_because: I started working a real on-the-books job a few months ago [Im only fifteen] and realized how hard a dollar is to earn, so I decided to use my money for something good.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare/serve food and clean up afterwards. The hours arent that great but Im thankful I have it.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I'm a big believer in helping others start a business & thru KIVA, it can be done with a minimal of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired, but had my own embroidery business for ten years.  It was done with a machine, rather than with the skills of hand work!!

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and show my children everyone can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I am a married Mom of two and I work part time for a courier company.

lenders.name: Daianna
lenders.loan_because: "We are here not to see through one another, but to see one another through"...I read that somewhere and carry that with me wherever I go...couple that with the fact that I was born in Canada (granting me an unearned advantage over billions of my fellow human beings) I strongly believe it is my moral obligation to assist those who need it. I also believe in "teaching to fish" and Kiva helps me do just that....and really...helping just makes me happy. Kind of selfish, I know ;)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm responsible for a team of people that create and manage communcation pieces and programs designed to create awareness for our company and its' products. We write and create newsletters, sales presentations, promotional items and advertising.

lenders.name: Nyman Family
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we know how lucky we are to be farming in Canada.  No matter where you go, farming is a challenging and rewarding business and we enjoy helping others get to do it.
lenders.occupational_info:
My husband drives a transport truck to help pay our bills.  He's often away for days at a time.
I take a few neighbourhood children in for day care and run entrepreneurship programs for teenagers.
We also run what is considered a small sheep farm with 75 sheep!

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: Its a small way to make a big difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my children the power of giving.

lenders.name: John and Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: Help out in a small way.

lenders.name: Mindy
lenders.loan_because: Want to help those who are willing to work to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Amtur-Rahman
lenders.loan_because: ALLAH gives to me every second of every day masha'allah

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage hard work and independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I create online learning courses for those who want to learn and access education by using the Internet.

lenders.name: Stravina
lenders.loan_because: Both my parents were entrepreneurs and worked very hard for all their children.I just want to see someone get the opportunity to realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am attending college and i work part time.Taking care of elderly and disabled patients in their homes.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Want to help those who are eager to better themselves and are willing to work hard for their goal.   Hoping to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I have the resources to help those who need a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with farmers and their families to  help them understand the financial side of their business so they can run their business better.  My philosophy is "Creating happy families and a healthy business".

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I have recently been to West Africa, and realized how hard it is to make a living for oneself. I know that even the smallest donation or loan can make a world of difference.
lenders.occupational_info: (I'm the girl on the left!). I have just  finished my bachelors degree and am hoping to go on to medical school.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.occupational_info: Taking care of other people, in a hospital setting.

lenders.name: Doreen
lenders.loan_because: I believe women are the force that will change the world for the better, so I feel privileged to help other women change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an author and playwright.

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs an extended helping hand at one point or another.  I've used more than my fair share of extended helping hands.  It's time for me to extend my hands to those who need it.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: Even a small loan gives people a chance to make a difference in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I assess patients and provide care to meet their physiological and mental needs.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupation: Dance Studio Owner and Elementary Teacher
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach dance and school to children. I was given a scholarship to dance once, and it shaped my life and gave me faith!

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: It is so great to help other women succeed in business
lenders.occupational_info: I won the International Scholarship for Women in Business and work for the State of Maryland. I am getting my Masters degree at night and feel it is important to give back.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people hope!  And, I have faith in people.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a National non-profit organizational in the health industry.

lenders.name: April Joy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in redistributing wealth from North America to directly help develop other parts of the world

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: We should all help each other if you have the means!
lenders.occupational_info: Sports and Athletics

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for and it is the least that I can do.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do...to lend a helping hand to those you can,

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed to be an American and live in the land of plenty. Hopefully I can help someone move out of poverty into a better life.

lenders.name: Esther
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference!

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I can.
